code: import moment from'moment';export var filterEmployeeAssignments=function filterEmployeeAssignments(assignments,key,sort){var arr=[];if(assignments&&assignments.length>0){arr=assignments.filter(function(m){return m.status===key;});}if(arr.length>0){if(sort)return arr.sort(function(a,b){return moment(b.deadline).diff(moment(a.deadline));});else return arr.sort(function(a,b){return moment(a.deadline).diff(moment(b.deadline));});}else return false;};
